oldcomments.title: Is there a way to add an
oldcomments.author: King
oldcomments.body: Is there a way to add an empty link to a navigation menu? I want sub pages to the main link to go somewhere, but I want a label with no link to the main category. Any ideas?

replies.title: I'd use the URI type page
replies.author: haclong
replies.body:
I'd use the URI type page

or use a key in the navigation array so you can use its child pages later
